cab.content:
SECRET.
G.T.- 1614.
WAR CABINET
HONOURS FOR THE MERCANTILE MARINE.
(Copy of letter from Lord Stamfordham to Sir M. Hankey)
3rd August, 1917.
Dear Hankey,
I have laid before the King the copy of Minute 16 of War Cabinet 198, and in reply am commanded to inform you that His Majesty approves of the recommendation therein contained.
Yours very truly,
(Sgd) STAMFORDHAM.
Lieut-Col. Sir Maurice Hankey, K.C.B.
Secretary to the War Cabinet.
